name: Irrational (itch)
description:
Summary

“Irrational” is a down-to-earth story about Lucy. A young woman’s struggles, living with generalized anxiety. The paralyzing thoughts and worries that seemingly spawn from nowhere that seem completely overwhelming at times and hinders her ability to live a much desired, peaceful life.

With a wall in front of her that seem so endlessly tall and unbreakable, Lucy tries to find comfort in spending time with her cute, white cat, and her increasingly worried roommate. But obstacles must be faced, both within and outside of her head. 

She just hopes that one day, she will be okay.  

Information

This a vn-type game that is focused around the story, character development, and dialogue between the various characters.

Estimated length: ~45 minutes.  

The game is completely free. Donations are not necessary but they are appreciated.

This is not a game that should be expected to offer professional help dealing with mental disorders of any kind. 

Content warning
  • Occasional swearing.
  • Display and mentions of potentially uncomfortable subjects.
Contact

Don’t hesitate to write a comment below if you have feedback of any kind.
